modules.name: Counter
modules.description: Counter (x2) - counts up to target value using clock in.

modules.name: Veins: Branches / Bernoulli Gate
modules.description: A clone of Audible Instruments Bernoulli Gate. Flips a coin with weighed probability.

modules.name: Comparator (x2)
modules.description: Comparator (x2) - Compare an incoming Signal against a Voltage. With Gate and CV Outputs.

modules.name: Debug (light)
modules.description: Slim, slightly altered clone of Computerscare's Debug. S&H, Random Voltage Generator, Volt-Meter.

modules.name: PolyTools: A Poly Tool Shed
modules.description: Merge Poly Signals / Clone Mono to Poly (offset, spread) / Poly to Poly Left & Poly Right / Sum Poly to Mono (w. gain) / Redact Channels from Poly Cable

modules.name: PolyMorph: Polyphonic Morphing / Crossfading Tool
modules.description: Morphs between Channels of a Poly Signal (top & bottom) or between 2 Mono-/Poly Signals (middle). Audio: x0.3 gain, -5|+5 & Volt: -10|+10.

modules.name: N1 - Poly to Mono Sequencer / 16:1 Sequential Switch
modules.description: 4 independent Sequencers or Switches (normaled). Switches between all inoming Channels. Playmodes: Forw./Backw./Random. Poly Output of all Sequencers on bottom.

modules.name: Seq16: 16 Step Trigger/Gate Sequencer and Switch
modules.description: Active Steps output triggers (trg out), adjacent steps are combined to gates (gt out). Modes: Forw/Backw/Random. 'CV' takes a poly signal & sends (active step = channel) to 'out' if step is active & channel present. Modes: S&H (samples incoming signal) & Switch (passes original signal). Reset input, End of Cycle output, Sequence Length dial.

modules.name: Divider: Clock Div Sequencer
modules.description: 4 Clock dividers (/1 to /32 | on/off), global probability, CLK/OR/XOR out, 'all on/off' buttons, CV in (ch 1-4) to on/off (div 1-4) [CV is experimental for now]. Inspired by the Trigger Riot.

modules.name: CRG: Clocked Random Gates clone
modules.description: A slim clone of Count Modulas CRG. Channel knob (for 1-16 channels). Probability knobs for ch. 1-8. Modes: Multi/Solo. Gates, Trigger, Clock outputs.

modules.name: Flamm: Burst Generator clone
modules.description: A slightly modified clone of Count Modulas Burst Generator. Internal Clk (Rate, Modes: Slow / Fast), # of Pulses, Probability, Re-trig on/off button, start & end of cycle trig, duration of cycle gate, manual trigger button.

modules.name: Voltage Bank: Occult S&H & CV Storage with modulation capabilities
modules.description: Derived from unless modules 'towers'. Two polyphonic Copymachines. After copying a Signal, a new Signal can be input and modulate the Storage via Trimpot and/or CV input. Trigger in is polyphonic and can do targeted overwrite of storage. Interesting Glitch effects can be achieved when copying bi-polar signals while in unipolar mode.

modules.name: Voltage Bank 2: Occult S&H & CV Storage with modulation and sequencing capabilities
modules.description: A row of unless modules 'towers' & an N1 Sequencer/Switch. Can copy, store, modulate a poly in and sequence it as mono out.

modules.name: Mono to Poly Shift Register & Sequencer
modules.description: Shift Register taking a mono Signal and clk/trg in and converts it into a poly Signal. The stored Voltages can be sequenced (forwrd/backwrd/random/CV). Sequencer outputs a mono Signal again. Useful to make a sequence polyphonic, remix a static sequence, as utility for Voltage Bank 2, Seq16, Morph etc..

modules.name: Drone: 8 voice v/Oct Cloud w. Drift
modules.description: Drift (strength & speed), Basenote (oct & semi), # of Voices, -8|+8 Voice offsets in semitones (for each voice), v/Oct input (CV in, overwrites Basenote settings). Outputs a polyphonic pitch Signal. Great for generating droning Clouds, unison, detune, humming Choirs.

modules.name: Noise: Dust generator with Rate, Filter, Amplitude and Random Trigger out
modules.description: Noise/Dust generator. External Clock in, internal CLK w. Rate knob, Amp/Gain setting, Low-Pass-Filter with Cutoff, Random Trigger out, Noise out. Best used with heavy modulation & the internal clock.

modules.name: Merge 8: 8 mono inputs, 1 poly output
modules.description: 8:1 Merge. Right-click menu to set # of output channels (default: automatic).

modules.name: Merge 16: 16 mono inputs, 1 poly output
modules.description: 16:1 Merge. Right-click menu to set # of output channels (default: automatic).

modules.name: Split 16: 1 poly input, 16 mono outputs
modules.description: 1:16 Split. LEDs show active outputs.

modules.name: Split 8: 1 poly input, 8 mono outputs
modules.description: 1:8 Split. LEDs show active outputs.

modules.name: 2 HP Blank Panel
modules.description: 2 HP Blank Panel
